Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- Added Indicator for Actual Character Texture Size.
- Added **One-Click Conversion** Button.
 Added An Option to Backup and Restore Texture Files before Converting Them to BC7 Format.
- There were also a few improvements in the performance of the plugin.
